title: 2 Bed 2 Bath Apartment with HUGE picture windows!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Welcome to Ryan Tower +', 'Monterey Garden these two landmark buildings are located within the heart of San Mateo’s magnificent serene and exclusive Baywood District.', 'Both conveniently located just two blocks from downtown San Mateo.', 'Downtown offers shopping, bistros, grocery stores, fine dining, a 12 screen cinema, 24 Hour Fitness, a new public library, Central Park, and lots of other entertainment.', 'Ryan Tower is a newly renovated dramatic high rise with pet-friendly studios, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartment homes, most with dramatic views of the bay or hills.', 'Conveniently located just 2 blocks west of El Camino on Third Avenue, a short distance to Caltrain, as well as minutes to the 101 and 280 Freeways.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'Today', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'No weight limit.', 'Max 2 pets per home.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Deposit:', '$800 - $900 Depending on credit + rental history', 'Leasing options:', '3 months,6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months,12+ months', 'Leasing notes:', 'REFUNDABLE $500 Holding deposit to reserve any unit.', 'Application fee:', '$55.58', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', '$100 - $200+', 'Laundry:', 'Shared', 'Parking type:', 'Garage, Covered, Off-Street, On-Street', 'Parking notes:', '$75, $100, $150 or street permit', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Range/Oven', 'Exterior:', 'Private Roof Patio, On-Site Storage', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Heat: forced air, Double pane / Storm windows', 'Wiring:', 'Cable-ready, High-speed internet, Wired', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Fitness center, Barbecue, Roof Top Deck, Bike Room, Pet Wash Station', 'Security and Access:', 'Elevator, Controlled access, Gated entry, Disability access', 'Views:', 'City, Mountain, Water', 'Additional features:', 'Hardwood floor, Non-Smoking Property', 'Offered by:', 'Ryan Tower', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
